name: sectional
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
US A sectional piece of furniture is made up of parts that can be arranged in various ways: a sectional sofa
Interests or aims that are sectional are limited to a particular group within an organization, society, or country and do not consider other groups: The national interest is more important than any sectional or personal interests.
